mapper.select: SELECT CATEGORY_NO AS no, CATEGORY_NAME AS name, PARENT_CATEGORY_NO AS parentNo FROM BookHub.CATEGORY WHERE PARENT_CATEGORY_NO IS NULL

SELECT CATEGORY_NO AS no, CATEGORY_NAME AS name, PARENT_CATEGORY_NO AS parentNo FROM BookHub.CATEGORY WHERE PARENT_CATEGORY_NO IN (SELECT CATEGORY_NO FROM BookHub.CATEGORY WHERE PARENT_CATEGORY_NO IS NULL);

SELECT CATEGORY_NO AS no, CATEGORY_NAME AS name, PARENT_CATEGORY_NO AS parentNo FROM BookHub.CATEGORY WHERE PARENT_CATEGORY_NO IN (SELECT CATEGORY_NO FROM BookHub.CATEGORY WHERE PARENT_CATEGORY_NO IN (SELECT CATEGORY_NO FROM BookHub.CATEGORY WHERE PARENT_CATEGORY_NO IS NULL))

SELECT CATEGORY_NO AS no, CATEGORY_NAME AS name, PARENT_CATEGORY_NO AS parentNo FROM BookHub.CATEGORY WHERE PARENT_CATEGORY_NO IN (SELECT CATEGORY_NO FROM BookHub.CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_NO = #{value})

SELECT CATEGORY_NO AS no, CATEGORY_NAME AS name, PARENT_CATEGORY_NO AS parentNo FROM BookHub.CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_NO IN (SELECT PARENT_CATEGORY_NO FROM BookHub.CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_NO = #{value})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BookHub.CATEGORY (CATEGORY_NAME, PARENT_CATEGORY_NO) VALUES (#{value}, NULL)
